name: One Different Ghost
description:
An old man has wandered alone into your graveyard. Every other ghost who shares eternity here with you is trying to kill him, and you only wish to help him escape.

This platformer was created for the Make-A-Level Leap Day 2020 Game Jam. My main goal for this project was to try to make every asset, from sprites to scripts, on my own. I did watch a few tutorials for things I have never done before, but I am happy with my end result. I hope you enjoy!
